name: Azurik: Rise of Perathia
description:
Azurik: Rise of Perathia is an action game. It was originally released in 2005. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Azurik: Rise of Perathia is available on Xbox.
Stephen Clarke-Willson produced the game. Stephen Clarke-Willson directed the game. Jeremy Soule scored the game.
